plot: An dedicated but non-conventional teacher wins the trust and help from three students and turning around a troubled class.
title: Yi Ge Jiao Xu Shu-xian de Ren

original_name: Yi Ge Jiao Xu Shu-xian de Ren
plot_en: An dedicated but non-conventional teacher wins the trust and help from three students and turning around a troubled class.
